statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, customer_name FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, customer_name, status FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status IN ('Shipped', 'Delivered') ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM orders WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM orders ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, status FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_status WHERE status_description = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, status_description, status_timestamp FROM order_status ORDER BY status_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, status_description, status_timestamp FROM order_status WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000);
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN order_status ON orders.order_id = order_status.order_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) >= 2 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, customer_id, status FROM orders
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM orders WHERE status='Pending'
SELECT order_id, location, status FROM order_tracking
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT tracking_id, location FROM order_tracking WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, status FROM Orders WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, shipment_date, status FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, count(*) as total_products FROM Orders JOIN Products ON Orders.order_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY order_id, customer_id;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Customers.customer_name FROM Orders INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE Orders.status='Delivered';

SELECT Customers.customer_id, Customers.customer_name, COUNT(*) as total_shipments FROM Customers JOIN Shipments ON Customers.customer_id = Shipments.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id, Customers.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_number, customer_name FROM orders WHERE status='Completed'
SELECT order_number, customer_name, status FROM orders WHERE customer_name='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status='Shipped' ORDER BY order_number DESC;

SELECT o.order_number, oi.quantity, p.product_name FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE o.status='Processing' AND p.price > 100 ORDER BY oi.quantity ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, oi.quantity, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE c.email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY p.price DESC;

SELECT o.order_number, oi.quantity, p.product_name, s.description FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id JOIN statuses s ON o.status = s.status_code WHERE s.description LIKE '%pending%' AND p.price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY o.order_number ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE p.price > 150 ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC;
